functions.name: inc
functions.docs: Increment by `delta` (saturating at uint64 max); returns the new value.

functions.name: set
functions.docs: Set the counter to an exact value (typically owner-only in examples).

events.name: Incremented
events.docs: Emitted after a successful increment; `value` is the new counter value.

events.name: Set
events.docs: Emitted when the counter is set directly.

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.docs: Caller lacks permission for this action.

meta.description: Canonical demo ABI for codegen in Python/TypeScript/Rust SDKs.
